briefTitle: Efficacy of Enhanced Recovery After Surgery Pathway for Total Mastectomy
officialTitle: Efficacy of Enhanced Recovery After Surgery Pathway for Total Mastectomy
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* female patients at least 18 years old undergoing total skin sparing mastectomy at University of California San Francisco Mount Zion hospital

Exclusion Criteria:

* patients undergoing concurrent bilateral salpingo-oophorectomy, flap reconstruction
